catalystDrepSignup.motivationsPlaceholder: Highlight your strengths, commitments and vision for the community
catalystDrepSignup.objectivesPlaceholder: Write about your values and your approach to governance...
catalystDrepSignup.qualificationsPlaceholder: What makes your qualified for this role in catalyst
catalystDrepSignup.2roundsRule: To proceed, you need to have participated in at least 2 cayalyst voting rounds.
catalystDrepSignup.signMessage: Sign so we can verify your wallet ownership.
catalystDrepSignup.willMaintain: I agree to store correctly this information and to maintain it
catalystDrepSignup.createAccountInfo:
1. If you already have an account, log in with your credentials.
2. If youâ€™re new, sign up using your email and create a secure password.
3. Verify your email to activate your account.
catalystDrepSignup.connectWalletInfo:
1. Choose a supported Cardano wallet (e.g., Yoroi, Daedalus, Eternl).
2. Follow the prompts to connect your wallet securely.
3. We will use the wallet to verify that you have participated in atleast 2 catalyst funding voting rounds after which you will be able to proceeed with your signup.
4. Click 'Next' to sign the message with your wallet.
catalystDrepSignup.signWalletInfo:
1. Approve a one-time sign message action to verify your wallet ownership.
2. This action does not transfer funds but links your wallet to your DRep account.
3. Follow the wallet instructions to complete the signing process.
catalystDrepSignup.successStepMsg: Your wallet has been added to this drep account.
catalystDrepSignup.successInfo:
1. If successful, youâ€™ll see a confirmation message, and your DRep account will be active.
2. If thereâ€™s an error, check for:
* Incorrect wallet connection
* Network delays or errors
3. Retry or contact support if issues persist.
catalystDrepSignup.platformStatementMsg: Platform Statement. Let the community know who you are and what you stand for.
catalystDrepSignup.platformStatementInfo:
1. Introduce yourself as a DRep and outline your governance principles.
2. Explain why ADA holders should delegate to you.
3. Support multiple languages to reach a global audience.

voterList.welcome: Before you start, let's set up your Voting List. A Voting List is a collection of proposals that you support and want others to consider. This helps streamline governance participation. Ready to begin? In the next steps, you'll name your list, add proposals, and explain your rationale for selecting them.
voterList.proposalsOnly: Unlike other list types, only proposals can be added to voting lists.
voterList.title: Title
voterList.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this list in a few words.

errors.rationaleLength: Rationale must be at least 200 characters

rationale.label: Rationale
rationale.placeholder: Summerize the reasoning behind your selections.

success.title: Success!!
success.message: Your Voting List has been created! Share it with others and make an impact on governance decisions.

steps.listDetailInfo: Give your Voting List a name and a short description. This helps others understand what your list is about
steps.proposalsInfo: Now, let's add proposals to your Voting List. You can search for existing proposals and select the ones that align.
steps.rationaleInfo: Why did you select these proposals? Providing a rationale helps others understand your choices and makes your list more credible.

bookmarks.intro:
Before you start, letâ€™s set up your Bookmark List. A bookmark list is a personalized collection of saved items, allowing you to easily organize, access, and manage content that matters to you. Ready to begin?

*In the next steps, youâ€™ll name your list, add your list, and explain your rationale for selecting them.*
bookmarks.listDetailInfo: Give your Voting List a name and a short description. This helps others understand what your list is about
bookmarks.listItemsInfo: Now, letâ€™s add related items to your Bookmark List. You can search for existing proposals and select the ones that align.

my.createVotingListBlurb: Creating a voting li'st is a way to stage your yes and abstain votes for a funding round. You can only add proposals from a single fund.
my.createTinderListBlurb: Creating a tinder list is a swipe right swipe left interface for creating voting lists. You can only add proposals from a single fund.
my.createListBlurb: Creating a bookmark list is a blank folder to put proposals, ideascale profiles, groups, reviews, and communities across multiple funds.

drepList.title: DReps Directory
drepList.subtitle: Delegate Representatives in Project Catalyst.
drepList.signUp: Sign up to be a DRep

faq.answer1: A DRep (Delegate Representative) is a trusted community member who votes on governance proposals on behalf of ADA holders.
faq.question2: Why should I delegate my voting power?
faq.answer2: Delegation allows you to have a say in Cardano's governance without having to review and vote on every proposal yourself.
faq.question3: How do I choose a DRep?
faq.answer3: You can select a DRep based on their values, expertise, and voting history. Browse profiles and pick one that aligns with your vision for Cardano.
faq.answer4: Yes, you can re-delegate your voting power to a different DRep anytime.
faq.answer5: Yes, delegation is secure. Your ADA never leaves your wallet, and you maintain full control over your funds.
faq.question6: Do I earn rewards for delegating?
faq.answer6: Currently, delegation is focused on governance participation, not financial rewards.
faq.answer7: DReps carefully analyze proposals, ensuring informed, high-quality votes that benefit the Cardano ecosystem.

landing.title: Shape the Future of Cardano, Delegate to a DRep Today!
landing.subtitle: Delegate Representatives (DReps) are community members who represent the interests of the community in Project Catalyst. They are elected by the community to participate in the governance of the Catalyst ecosystem.
landing.signUp: Sign up to be a DRep
landing.drepDescription: DReps (Delegate Representatives), vote on governance proposals in Cardaon on behalf of ADA holders. Instead of voting individually, you can delegate your voting power to a DRep who represents your interests helping shape the future of Cardano efficiently and transparently.
landing.projectCatalyst: Project Catalyst's Continued Growth and the Need for Delegation
landing.projectCatalystDescription: The Cardano community's Project Catalyst has grown rapidly, with Fund8 receiving nearly 1,000 proposals. To manage this increasing workload, a new delegation system is being introduced for sustainable governance.
landing.empowerDescription: Delegation allows ADA holders to assign their voting power to DReps, ensuring their voices are heard across more proposals. DReps enhance decision-making in Project Catalyst by voting on most proposals.
landing.excite: Excited for for DReps in catalyst?
